Title: Musk says received 'verbal' OK for NY-DC hyperloop; provides no detail
Body: SAN FRANCISCO Entrepreneur Elon Musk on Thursday said that he had received "verbal government approval" to build an underground transport hyperloop between New York and Washington, although he did not say who gave the approval or how any such project would proceed.
